mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bill (Room_id, User_id, price, is_pay) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{userId}, #{price}, #{isPay});
mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS roomId, r.room_number AS roomNumber, r.room_type AS roomType, DATEDIFF(NOW(), ur.create_time) AS days, r.price AS price, r.price * DATEDIFF(NOW(), ur.create_time) AS totalPrice FROM user_room ur LEFT JOIN room r ON ur.room_id = r.id WHERE ur.room_id = #{roomId} AND ur.user_id = #{userId}
